thread.title: Hotel 3232 - Welcomes Music Lovers During the Months of Open Air Concerts
thread.title_full: Hotel 3232 - Welcomes Music Lovers During the Months of Open Air Concerts

title: Hotel 3232 - Welcomes Music Lovers During the Months of Open Air Concerts
text:
July 28, 2015 20:02 ET Hotel 3232 - Welcomes Music Lovers During the Months of Open Air Concerts 
NEW YORK, NY--(Marketwired - Jul 28, 2015) - Tourists and residents alike enjoy the summer months in New York City, and New York's own fabulous Hotel 3232 , located at 32 E 32 nd St, is ready to welcome music lovers of all genres for the open air concert season of 2015. The charming hotel boasts a long tradition of creative services, and they know the importance of providing entertainment information to everyone who stays with them, be it for business or for pleasure. 
The 24-hour Concierge team is ready to provide guests with directions and information to music lovers for all of the planned shows. The venues for 2015 include Bryant Park in Manhattan, Fort Totten Park in Queens, Forest Park, Riverside Park South, and Van Cordlandt Park in the Bronx, Alice Austen on Staten Island, and of course the world-famous Central Park in Manhattan. If there is one thing that the staff of Hotel 3232 New York is known for, it is their ability to provide a unique and amazing New York City experience. 
Music lovers can visit New York from June through August and enjoy open air concerts to suit any taste, from country music to opera, classic rock, R&B, swing, brass quartets, jazz, kid-friendly tunes, and more. Artists come from around the world to perform for audiences, and the event is currently entering its seventh year. Central Park SummerStage is one of the largest attractions, and Hotel 3232 is prepared to help guests locate tickets and navigate the line-up of talent with their travel dates. Celebrate Brooklyn! is also a main attraction for music lovers, taking place in Prospect Park. Other events include the Governors Ball, the Northside Festival, Summer Jam, Afropunk, River to River Fest, and more. Line ups include artists such as Lenny Kravitz, Willie Nelson, Kendrick "King Kunta" Lamar, as well as festivals that bring in dance, theatre, and visual-arts programming. 
Hotel 3232 has quickly gained a reputation for providing superb service and traveler access to the best that New York City has to offer. The hotel partners with local businesses to offer additional amenities to guests, delivering a one-of-a-kind New York City experience to every guest. The boutique hotel is decorated with the modern art of local artists, and is located in the historic Murray Hill neighborhood, known as one of the most colorful areas in Midtown Manhattan. Owned and operated by Think Properties, the hotel is known for accommodating guests who want to experience the fullness of New York City life, while maintaining the comforts of home. The hotel is within walking distance of Times Square, Grand Central Station, The Empire State Building, and many other hot spots and attractions. 
To learn more, visit http://hotel3232news.com , or call the hotel directly at 646-692-3760
